In England, in the seven days to 16 March, there were 32,167 new confirmed cases (57.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 09 March, there were 33,106 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 3% (939 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 21 March is 3,759,280 (6,678.8 cases per 100,000 population).
